result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

from Clerk of Court to DE requesting DE signature on bond and return 2 copies of bond in the SASE by 7/29/22. Bond mailed to the DE on 7/14/22.  gll

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Madeline or Daniel H., Target in St. Croix County, Walgreens in St. Croix County, or River Front Athletic Club in Hudson, WI.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

2:27 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA: Brian Smestad DF ATTY: Travis Satorius for today   Defendant Dominique Marie Wegleitner appeared by video from Shakopee Correctional. DE confirms address and DOB. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waive reading. Bond argument; bond ordered. DE states she has issues with the complaint. Court will not address today. Court orders bond. Clerk to mail bond to DE. Court sets Prelim- waiver of personal appearance to be filed. DE to contact PD to qualify. Adjourned at 2:34 PM.  gll
